text: aur un mushrikon mein se kuchh aapakee baat dhyaan se sunate hain aur (vaastav mein) hamane unake dilon par parde (aavaran) daal rakhe hain ki baat na samajhen[1] aur unake kaan bhaaree kar diye hain, yadi ve (saty ke) pratyek lakshan dekh len, tab bhee usapar eemaan nahin laayenge, yahaan tak ki jab ve aapake paas aakar jhagadate hain, jo kaafir hain, to ve kahate hain ki ye to poorvajon kee kathaayen hain
